ComicInfo.Series: Van Helsing vs The Mummy of Amun-Ra
ComicInfo.Summary:
She's faced countless vampires including Dracula himself... she's defeated monsters that defy the imagination including Frankenstein... but now she's about to face her greatest challenge. This time Liesel Van Helsing must travel back through time to ancient Egypt to battle an enemy that has returned for vengeance... the Mummy of Amun-Ra.

ComicInfo.Title: Sometimes Friend, Before It Ends...
